TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BuildPropertyGroup extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象可以表示该项目或虚拟的属性，例如全局属性或环境变量的属性集合中的元素。A object can represent a element in the project, or a virtual collection of properties, such as global properties or environment variable properties. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，并使用方法将内容添加到项目。The following example creates a object and uses the method to add content to the project. ， ，和使用类来添加、 删除和更改项目中的项。The , , and classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project. param.span: 如果要创建 的深层副本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to create a deep copy of the ; otherwise, .

summary.span: 创建 的深层副本或浅表副本。

span.span: Creates a deep or shallow copy of the .
A copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 浅表复制引用与原始相同的属性组。A shallow copy of a references the same property group as the original. 浅表副本将反映在两个副本的修改。Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies. 深层副本创建一个新的 XML 元素引用，以便这两份可以独立进行修改。A deep copy of a creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the can be independently modified. 如果直接对应于项目中的元素 (而不是对应于一套虚拟属性，如环境变量和全局属性)，仅深层允许副本。If the corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of virtual properties, such as environment variable and global properties), only deep copies are allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许调用方使用`foreach`C# 语言的语句 (`for each`在 Visual Basic 中) 循环访问单个中的对象。This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the individual objects in the . ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，并使用， ，和类列出所有项和项目中的属性。The following example creates a object and uses the , , and classes to list all the items and properties in the project.
